title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. A, art. 8, pt. 444 - Description Of Accounts
content:

§ 444.1 - Preface

Balance Sheets (§ 444.2 to 444.6)

Income Statements (§ 444.7 to 444.22)

Natural Classification of Expense (§ 444.23)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. A, art. 8, pt. 444

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§2803, 2803-b, 3612

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
